title: DNA Extraction
author: Opentrons
description: This protocol allows you to automate 4 common variants of SDS-PAGE solution prep into 2 96-well plates (reducing and non-reducing agent plate).
process:
Submit two CSVs containing information of the buffer to transferred in each well of each plate.
Download the protocol.
Open the protocol in the Opentrons app.

markdown.title: DNA Extraction
markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.description: This protocol allows you to automate 4 common variants of SDS-PAGE solution prep into 2 96-well plates (reducing and non-reducing agent plate).
markdown.reagents:
Invitrogen Tricine SDS Sample Buffer (2x)
Invitrogen Nupage Sample Reducing Agent
Novex Tris-Glycine Sample Buffer (2x)
markdown.process:
1. Submit two CSVs containing information of the buffer to transferred in each well of each plate.
2. Download the protocol.
3. Open the protocol in the Opentrons app.
